## Scape a table

I want the first table from [this page]: https://samhda.s3-us-gov-west-1.amazonaws.com/s3fs-public/field-uploads/2k15StateFiles/NSDUHsaeShortTermCHG2015.htm

read in the html
```{r}
url = "https://samhda.s3-us-gov-west-1.amazonaws.com/s3fs-public/field-uploads/2k15StateFiles/NSDUHsaeShortTermCHG2015.htm"

drug_use_html = read_html(url)
```

extract the table(s); focus on the first one
```{r}
table
drug_use_html %>%
  html_nodes(css = "table") %>%
  first() %>% # not working!!!
  html_table() %>% 
  slice(-1) %>% #removes the first row
  as_tibble()

table_marj = 
  drug_use_html |> 
  html_table() |> 
  first() |>
  slice(-1) 

table_marj
```
## Star Wars movie info
```{r}
url = "https://www.imdb.com/list/ls070150896/"
swm_html = 
  read_html(url)
```

grab elements that i want
```{r}
title_vec = 
  swm_html %>%
  html_nodes (css = ".lister-item-header a") %>% #extract html nodes
  html_text() 

gross_rev_vec = 
  swm_html %>%
  html_nodes(css = ".text-small:nth-child(7) span:nth-child(5)" ) %>%
  html_text()

# to know how long the movie is
runtime_vec= 
  swm_html %>%
  html_nodes(css = ".runtime") %>%
  html_text()

swm_df = 
  tibble(
    title = title_vec,
    gross_rev = gross_rev_vec,
    runtime = runtime_vec)
```

## get some water data
this is from an API
```{r}
nyc_water = 
  GET("https://data.cityofnewyork.us/resource/ia2d-e54m.csv") %>%
  content("parsed")

nyc_water = GET("https://data.cityofnewyork.us/resource/ia2d-e54m.json") %>%
  content("text") %>%
  jsonlite::fromJSON() %>%
  as_tibble()
```
